summary: REQ-8 appears implemented by updating the site footer Contact Information area to show the owner name, phone, and email with English labels, and without any backend/canister changes in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state tracking (project_state.json) without being requested in REQ-8.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for footer contact info updates and explicitly notes no backend changes; it does not request project state/version metadata edits.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated generated documentation/summary file describing frontend components (frontend-file-summaries.txt) without being requested in REQ-8.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating repository summary/documentation files; only functional footer contact info changes are required.
